Jeffrey K. Radt
TA Manager for Graham Healthcare Group specializing in identifying and hiring TOP TALENT for #HealthcareJobs #NurseJobs #NursingJobs #RNJobs #LPNJobs…
Clarus is an innovative Technology Company changing the way patients interact with doctors and their staff. We are a leader in Healthcare Communication Technology that improves call management with cutting-edge technology. By providing automated, cloud-based communication tools to Physician Practices throughout the United States, Clarus elevates the patient experience and streamlines communication.Clarus is looking for a HEAD OF SOFTWARE ENGINEERING (SAAS ARCHITECT) in a Remote role who will architect, develop, and manage the team transforming today’s Clarus Care platform and applications into the next generation of reliable, secure, efficient, sustainable, and cost-effective SaaS we need for the next phase of our growth.Salary $170,000 - $190,000 WHY WILL YOU LOVE THIS HEAD OF SOFTWARE ENGINEERING ROLE WITH CLARUS?LEADERSHIP: You will be required to demonstrate exceptional leadership, emotional intelligence, superior Agile Project Management proficiency, and a belief in developing the skills and talents of othersVISIBILITY: You will represent the Engineering Organization, consisting of Software Development and SRE/DevOps on AWS, to the Leadership TeamIMPACT: You will align Engineering Projects with company objectives, providing expert guidance and support, approving newly developed policies, and maintaining positive relationships with internal and external stakeholdersWHY WILL YOU LOVE WORKING AT CLARUS?In the 1ST year of employment, you will receive 10 Days PTO + 9 HolidaysUnlimited time off after your 1ST year of employmentHealth Benefits (Medical/Dental/Vision); 401k; InsuranceWHAT ARE THE DAY-TO-DAY FUNCTIONS & RESPONSIBILITIES OF A HEAD OF SOFTWARE ENGINEERING AT CLARUS?Demonstrate an “API First” thought processPartner with the Product Leadership Team to shape the vision, secure the budget, and validate the product roadmapEnsure objectives and development plans are established and reviewed continuously throughout the yearEstablish timelines for deliverables that allow predictable resultsLead technical design decisions across teams to ensure solutions meet business requirements and ensure data and architectural designs are documented, consistent, maintainable, flexible, and cost-effectiveProvide technical leadership, mentoring, and coaching for development team members, fostering a culture of accountability, innovation, and team buildingMaintain and expand software development skills, including identifying and evaluating new technologies that could benefit our platformWHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR IN A PROFESSIONAL LIKE YOU…IDEAL CANDIDATE: The ideal candidate will have experience in identifying and navigating organizational changes, an "API First" mentality, and a keen interest in trends in Engineering and the Healthcare IndustryBachelor's Degree or Master’s Degree in Technical/Business discipline REQUIRED10+ years of combined PHP, Laravel, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Vue, Vue-CLI, Vue.js 2/3.x, Vuex, and VueRouter10+ years of full-stack development experience for SaaS design and implementation: Lambda, Dynamo, API Gateway, S3, IAM, STS, SES, SNS, SQS, CloudWatch, Nginx, Apache, PostgreSQL, Docker5+ years in Agile practice; Achieved AWS Certification3-5 years of direct Software Engineer Manager experience (Teams of 5+ members)Experience and knowledge in developing/consuming REST APIs, including tooling for documentation (Swagger/OAS, Postman), versioning, service discovery/registration, testing, and management, with recent experience in AWS API gateways a plusExperience in Test Driven Development, including knowledge and experience in testing frameworks (JEST, Cypress)Understand HIPAA/HI Tech/SOC requirements for healthcare software and ensure complianceGood understanding of Object-Oriented Concepts, Service-Oriented Architectures, Distributed Systems Design Concepts, and Computer Science fundamentalsABOUT CLARUS:Clarus is an innovative Technology Company changing the way patients interact with doctors and their staff. By providing automated, cloud-based communication tools to Physician Practices throughout the United States, Clarus elevates the patient experience and streamlines communication. The company’s unique offering eliminates unknowns and errors of traditional answering services. Their predictable pricing and easy-to-use platform allows provider organizations of any size to transform the way they take calls.NOTICE: Successful completion of a Drug Screen prior to employment is part of our Background Process, which includes Medical and Recreational Marijuana. By supplying your Phone Number, you agree to receive communication via Phone or Text. By submitting your application, you are confirming that you are Legally Authorized to work in the United States.
